subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ivory Latta, the leader of No. 2 North Carolina, made a tie-breaking 3-pointer from the top of the key with 1 minute 1 second remaining against No. 6 Connecticut in a battle of two of the best women’s basketball teams in the country.
snippet: Ivory Latta, the leader of No. 2 North Carolina, made a tie-breaking 3-pointer from the top of the key with 1 minute 1 second remaining against No. 6 Connecticut in a battle of two of the best women’s basketball teams in the country.
